p: Compounds were identified by calculating their Kovats retention index with respect to the reference n-alkanes C7–C40 mix, matching the mass spectral data with NIST 08 MS library [ 45], by comparing the MS fragmentation patterns with literature data [ 46], and by co-injection with commercially available standards. Quantification was carried out by extrapolation of the compound’s peak areas from GC-FID profiles.
